Text: Since it is the top rated show on rte 2 ahead of programs such as LOST, DESPERATE HOUSEWIFES, SCRUBS etc, and may even if some commentaters are correct be the first show on rte 2 to top the network ratings, the idea that a second series will not be commissioned is bizzare.
Woo! Nice one! I only heard about this last time I was back in Ireland. Really looking forward to this, cheers!
